title: Silenced in Salem
description: Salem: A magical weekend escape offering a luxurious hotel, a psychic black cat, and a handsome “bad boy” chef who might just win the young foodie’s heart.But when murder is on the menu, will she be the next victim?22-year-old Nina agrees to review a new boutique hotel for her lifestyle magazine. Shortly upon arrival, her mouth waters at the sight of the hotel’s scrumptious chef.As the sugar plum culinarian shows the superstitious scribe the “secret Salem” of haunted burial grounds and witches’ dens, mystery rustles through the crisp fall breeze.At the stroke of midnight, a séance invokes the spirit of the hotel’s original owner. As the ghost swears revenge on his killer, guests laugh it off as Halloween fun.But when the present-day hotel owner gets whacked, police blame Nina’s toque-topped lover.Can the enchanting chef be the culprit?Will Nina prove her creamy cuisiner’s innocence and discover the real culprit before it’s too late?Silenced in Salem is a fast-paced, laugh-out-loud funny cozy mystery, packed with quirky characters, mouth-watering cuisine, and an adorable, clairvoyant black kitten.You'll devour this delectable, cozy romantic mystery. Because in the black velvet Salem sky, love magic blazes bright.Get it Now
author: Cat Green
